archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SUP.10.BP8 Establish bidirectional traceability
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish bidirectional traceability between change requests and work products affected by the change requests. In case that the change request is initiated by a problem, establish bidirectional traceability between change requests and the corresponding problem reports. NOTE 7: Bidirectional traceability supports consistency, completeness and impact analysis.
